mapper.update: update file set delete_user=#{userId}, delete_time = now() where path = #{path}
mapper.select:
select f.id, f.path, f.name, f.file_size, f.uuid, f.upload_time, u.id as upload_user_id, u.username as upload_user_username, u.name as upload_user_name from file f left join user u on f.upload_user = u.id
f.delete_time is null and (f.upload_user = #{currentUserId} or 'admin' in (select r.code from user_role ur left join role r on ur.role_id = r.id where ur.user_id = #{currentUserId}))
and f.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and u.name like concat('%',#{uploadUser},'%')
order by f.id desc
